ingredients.ingredient: coarse sea salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
coarse sea salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste

gear.name: Cast Iron Skillet
gear.searchTerm: cast iron skillet or heavy-bottomed skillet

cookingTips: Bring steaks to room temperature 30 minutes before cooking for even doneness throughout
Use high heat and don't move steaks for first 3-4 minutes to develop a crust
Top steaks with crabmeat topping during last few minutes of cooking or after for elegant presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This elevated dish combines surf and turf. Are you experienced with cooking filet mignon to your preferred doneness?
